title: The lead researcher behind those Sims-like 'generative agents' on the future of AI NPCs
description: PhD student Joon Sung Park spoke to us about his team's research and why scientists need science fiction.

title: This Caribbean survival game has you follow in the footsteps of Ponce De León, which in my case meant eating several dogs
description: Stranded on an island in the 1500s, Survival: Fountain of Youth is no picnic. Unless you go to picnics where they serve dog.

title: This Marvel Snap card is so completely broken, everyone is getting it for free
description: Kitty Pryde only lasted two days before her card was disabled, and it won't be back until the May update.

title: If an irradiated wasteland filled with murderous monsters isn't bad enough on its own, now you can add AI Joe Rogan to it
description: The Joe Rogan Experience mod for Fallout: New Vegas brings interviews and advertisements to the airwaves of the wasteland.

description: It's time to buy videogames again.

description: Ekuegan says it wasn't him, but Bungie has no doubt.

description: In the arcane apocalypse, you're always outnumbered.
